data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Apotheosis
data.description: Each time Healing Energy ticks, there is a 33% chance to apply Blessing of Isha to the target.

data.name: Arcane Suppression
data.description: Knocks back all enemies within 20 feet and silences them, making them unable to use magic for 3 seconds.

data.name: Arcing Power
data.description: Whenever one of your damaging spells hits an enemy, your defensive target will become healed for 25% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Balance Essence
data.note:
Tranquility reduces cast time.
Tranquility allows move-casting.
Builds Force
data.description: Deals X spirit damage to your target, and heals your defensive target for Y health plus 150% of the damage done.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Grants a 300 unique bonus to elemental resistance. Gain a 169 unique bonus to corporeal and spiritual resistance.

data.name: Blessing of Isha
data.description: Heals your entire group for X health over 6 seconds.

data.name: Blinding Light
data.description: For 5 seconds, your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them will take an additional 1 second to build up all abilities.

data.name: Bolstering Rains
data.description: Rain Lord will now also grant the target X morale to all groupmates within 100 feet.

data.name: Boon of Hysh
data.description: Heals your target for X health. Heals them for an additional Y for each Lambent Aura, Healing Energy, and Blessing of Isha on the target.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 spiritual damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Changing Winds
data.description: Law of Age now has a 20 second cooldown.

data.name: Cleansing Light
data.note:
Target must be Hexed or Ailing
Force reduces cooldown.
Builds Tranquility
data.description: You cleanse an ally's wound and remove one ailment or hex. If an effect is removed, your ally will absorb up to X damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Desperation
data.description: Your healing abilities become 25% more effective when the target is below 40% hit points.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to willpower.

data.name: Dispel Magic
data.description: Fury of Asuryan will now deal additional spiritual damage and always remove 1 blessing from the target.

data.name: Dissipating Energies
data.description: A groupmate becomes surrounded by dangerous energies for 5 seconds. Every second, all enemies within 30 feet of them will suffer X spiritual damage.

data.name: Dissipating Hatred
data.description: You detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will do 1800 raw healing to your target.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Empowered Lores
data.description: Whenever you critically hit with an ability that builds either Force or Tranquility, you will gain one additional point. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Energy of Vaul
data.note:
Tranquility reduces cast time.
Tranquility allows move-casting.
Builds Force
data.description: A wash of power leeches the breath from your target and up to four other enemies within 25 feet of them, dealing X spiritual damage (intel mod) to each. Their stolen breath will heal your defensive target and allies within 20 feet of them for Y health (willpower mod), plus 50% of the total inflicted damage.

data.name: Flames of the Phoenix
data.description: Flames burst from a spot that you select, damaging all enemies within 20 feet of that spot for up to 4 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50% and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Funnel Energy
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet have their action point costs increased by 50% for 15 seconds, and all allies in the area have their action point costs reduced by 50% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Funnel Essence
data.description:
You focus your powers on your defensive target, restoring up to X health to them over 3 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or if you run out of action points.

This ability will trigger a 10 second buff on the target for use with Isha's Denial.

data.name: Fury of Asuryan
data.description: Calls forth the wrath of Asuryan in the form of a pillar of magical energy, dealing X spirit damage to your target.

data.name: Gift of Life
data.note:
Force reduces cast time.
Only usable on Dead Players
data.description: Resurrects your target with 20% health.

data.name: Golden Aura
data.description: Shield of Saphery will now grant the target 15% additional damage while active, but the cooldown is increased to 20 seconds.

data.name: Healing Energy
data.description: Your target regains X health immediately, then continues to gain another Y health over 10 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Hurried Restore
data.description: Gift Of Life now resurrects allies instantly, but stuns you for 3 seconds.

data.name: Isha's Denial
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet gain Isha's Denial. All healing over time effects you cast on targets affected by Isha's Denial will grant a 2% reduced chance to be critically hit.

data.name: Isha's Encouragement
data.description: If Cleansing Light successfully removes an effect from an ally, then they will also regain X health over 5 seconds.

data.name: Isha's Ward
data.description: You gain a shield that absorbs 3600 damage for 30 seconds.

data.name: Lambent Aura
data.description: Heals your target for X health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Law of Age
data.description: If you have 5 Isha's Denial, you will now have 5 stacks of Force. If you have Prismatic Shield, you will now have 5 stacks of Tranquilty

data.name: Law of Conductivity
data.description: Deals X spirit damage to your target over 15 seconds.

data.name: Law of Gold
data.description: Deals X spirit damage and silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 5 seconds.

data.name: Magical Infusion
data.description:
Infuses protective magic into an ally for 30 seconds, allowing them to recover from near-fatal wounds.

If the ally's health is reduced below 30%, this effect will immediately dispel itself to restore X health if they are still alive. As long as this effect persists, the value of incoming heals on the target is increased by 25%.

A player may only be affected by a single Magical Infusion at a time.

data.name: Master of Balance
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit will all abilities by 10%.

data.name: Mistress of The Marsh
data.description: For 10 seconds, all enemies within 20 feet of a spot that you select will take a (2 * rank) ability penalty to initiative and become snared, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Prismatic Shield
data.description:
Everyone in your group within 100 feet gains a X ability bonus to all resistances for 1 hour.

You can only give Isha's Denial or Prismatic Shield.

data.name: Radiant Burst
data.description: Radiant Lance and Radiant Gaze will now effect all enemies within 10 feet of your target.

data.name: Radiant Gaze
data.description: Deals X spiritual damage over 9 seconds and reduces your target's damage and chance to critically hit by 5%.

data.name: Radiant Lance
data.description: A lance of brilliant energy erupts from your staff, dealing X spirit damage to your target.

data.name: Rain Lord
data.description: Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to strength, intelligence, and ballistic skill for 20 seconds.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 raw damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Reclaim Magic
data.description: You employ your mastery of High Magic to gain 180 action points over 10 seconds. You will be unable to generate Force or Tranquility for the duration.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 action points over 3 seconds. (Currently disabled)

data.name: Run Between Worlds
data.description: Reduces the cooldown time for Walk Between Worlds by 50%.

data.name: Scatter The Winds
data.description: Deals X spiritual damage to your target over 10 seconds, and causes all heals that they receive to become 50% less effective.

data.name: Scorching Touch
data.description:
Reduces the duration and tick interval of Searing Touch by 50%. Radiant Lance will now deal an additional X spirit damage to the target over 5 seconds.

You can no longer use Cleansing Light, Walk Between Worlds, or Gift of Life.

data.name: Searing Touch
data.description: You concentrate on your target for up to 6 seconds, repeatedly dealing X spiritual damage to them as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Shield of Saphery
data.description: Surrounds an ally with a magical barrier for up to 9 seconds which will absorb up to X damage.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 300 raw damage per tick for 3 ticks over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Storm of Cronos
data.description: A field of energy strikes the target and enemies within 20 feet of them, dealing X spiritual damage and causing them to take a Y ability penalty to spirit resistance for 20 seconds.

data.name: Tranquil Presence
data.description: Applies Healing Energy, Lambent Aura, and Blessing of Isha to all groupmates within 100 feet.

data.name: Transfer Force
data.description: Deals X spiritual damage to your target over 24 seconds and heals your groupmates for 50% of the damage done on each tick.

data.name: Transfer Magic
data.description:
Isha's Denial will cause groupmates to gain 10 action points anytime they are hit with a direct damage attack. You will gain 5 action points each time this happens and can only happen once per second per groupmate.

Removing this tactic will dispel Isha's Denial from your group.

data.name: Walk Between Worlds
data.description: You can not be set back for 5 seconds and detaunts all enemies around you, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal to you to 50%.

data.name: Wild Healing
data.description: Your Lambent Aura, Healing Energy, and Blessing of Isha now all gain 1 additional tick of healing.

data.name: Wind Blast
data.description: You call forth a powerful gust of wind which slams into enemies within 30 feet of you, knocking players away a medium distance and knocking monsters down. Anyone hit by the wind becomes snared, reducing their run speed by 20% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Winds' Protection
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet regain 800 health over 15 seconds, and become surrounded by a magical barrier which will absorb 2400 damage.
